mapper.select:
select t.tno, m.name, m.email, m.profile_pic, m.nickname, m.sex, nc.ncat_name, bc.bcat_name, sg.sgg_name, sd.sido_name from har_tutor t inner join har_member m on m.mno=t.tno inner join har_tcat tc on tc.tno=t.tno inner join har_narrow_cat nc on nc.ncat_no=tc.ncat_no inner join har_broad_cat bc on bc.bcat_no=nc.bcat_no inner join har_tdist td on td.tno=t.tno inner join har_sigungu sg on sg.sgg_no=td.sgg_no inner join har_sido sd on sd.sido_no=sg.sido_no
m.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or m.email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or sg.sgg_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or sd.sido_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or nc.ncat_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or bc.bcat_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by t.tno asc

select t.tno, m.name, m.email, m.profile_pic, m.nickname, m.sex, m.bdate, m.zipcode, m.addr, m.det_addr, m.rdttm, m.mrno, m.mstat nc.ncat_name, bc.bcat_name, sg.sgg_name, sd.sido_name from har_tutor t inner join har_member m on m.mno=t.tno inner join har_tcat tc on tc.tno=t.tno inner join har_narrow_cat nc on nc.ncat_no=tc.ncat_no inner join har_broad_cat bc on bc.bcat_no=nc.bcat_no inner join har_tdist td on td.tno=t.tno inner join har_sigungu sg on sg.sgg_no=td.sgg_no inner join har_sido sd on sd.sido_no=sg.sido_no where tno = #{value}
mapper.update: update har_tutor set tintro=#{intro}, tappl=#{application}, sgg_name=#{sigungu}, sido_name=#{sido}, ncat_name=#{narrowCategory}, bcat_name=#{broadCategory} where no = #{no}
